project.ss.engine
Interface ControledPlayer

All Superinterfaces:
Player
All Known Implementing Classes:
ControledPlayerImpl
public interface ControledPlayer
extends Player

This interface adds output control to the basic interface Player. It provided the gain (volume) and pan (speaker balance) controlling. It also provides the mute functionality

Method Summary
 float getGain()
          Returns the current volume level
 float getPan()
          Returns the current pan value
 void muteOff()
          Revert thr muting ot the playing audio
 void muteOn()
          Mutes the playing audio

          Sets the gain( volume ).
 void setPan(float pan)
          Sets the pan( speaker balance ).
